# activeDocumentCreationIntent

**Instance Property**

The current intent that defines how your app creates a document.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var activeDocumentCreationIntent: UIDocument.CreationIntent? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to access the current intent. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/customizing-a-document-based-app-s-launch-experience].
title: activeDocumentCreationIntent
